title: Get Early Access to Claim the New Vapid FMJ MK V Supercar with GTA+
contents: It’s already jam-packed under the tree this holiday season for GTA+ Members, with a week of exclusive early access to the new Vapid FMJ MK V supercar that’s free to claim at The Vinewood Car Club showroom, a GTA$1,000,000 discount on all Prix Luxury mansion properties from A Safehouse in the Hills, and much more. Plus, get a complementary upgrade for your Mansion Vehicle Workshop, remote access to your business staff via the Vinewood Club App, holiday costumes, and more. GTA$1,000,000 MANSION DISCOUNT Enter the upper echelons of Los Santos luxury living at a reduced rate. Take advantage of a GTA$1,000,000 discount on all three Prix Luxury Real Estate properties through January 7, 2026 as a GTA+ Member. That’s GTA$3,000,000 off if you completed the New Listings Missions before December 7 as part of Prix Luxury’s VIP Program earlier this month. CLAIM A FREE VAPID FMJ MK V The designers of the Vapid FMJ MK V worked from a simple prompt: a supercar, trimmed of all its fat, surgically enhanced, and primed to crash out at high speeds like the stars tanning poolside at The Richman Hotel. GTA+ Members can claim their free FMJ MK V decked out in the White Stripe livery one week before it goes on sale to the general populace simply by visiting The Vinewood Car Club showroom. Switch up your ride’s paint job with free Red Rainbow Flip Chameleon Paint and Red Prismatic Pearl Chameleon Wheel Paint. Visit any Auto Shop or Vehicle Workshop with an eligible vehicle to apply these and other special paints. See full event details at the Rockstar Newswire

title: GTA Online: A Safehouse in the Hills Now Available
contents: Status is everything, and in GTA Online: A Safehouse in the Hills you can now revel in your rightful position amongst the city's elite with a lavish new mansion property. Plus, cruise the streets in a fleet of new upscale vehicles that complement your new palace, disrupt plans for an autonomous surveillance state in a set of exciting new missions, or create your own adventures with the new Rockstar Mission Creator, and so much more. {STEAM_CLAN_IMAGE}/6144970/0ce50ee9bb7710275496bc923c24e70ead3d6885.jpg IMPECCABLE MANORS Prix Luxury Real Estate spared no expense on these modern architectural marvels, combining tasteful design and cutting-edge technology to elevate every touchpoint. Choose from three distinct locations in the most exclusive neighborhoods — each erected on a spacious plot with ample accommodations. {STEAM_CLAN_IMAGE}/6144970/a2d20abb8a8a853147b39bd2527a5e07af478dce.jpg NEW VEHICLES A Safehouse in the Hills introduces a slate of new top-of-the-line vehicles to GTA Online, including the futuristic new Pfister X-treme (Super), the throwback-inspired Übermacht Sentinel XS4 (Sedan), and the retro-styled Grotti GT750 (Sports Classic). GTA+ Members get early access this week to the sumptuous Vapid FMJ MK V (Super). {STEAM_CLAN_IMAGE}/6144970/3b288aa49752d38ad82818e8ca28eacdac916802.jpg KNOWAY OUT Avi Schwartzman might be paranoid, but it looks like he’s genuinely onto something this time. Self-driving vehicle start-up KnoWay is using a fleet of autonomous SUVs to build a shadowy surveillance network. Help Avi put a stop to it by any means necessary in KnoWay Out. See full details at the Rockstar Newswire.

title: GTA Online: A Safehouse in the Hills Coming December 10
contents: Prime luxury real estate comes to GTA Online in A Safehouse in the Hills, the monumental new update arriving December 10. For those who have reached the highest rungs of the criminal ladder, celebrate your triumph with a painstakingly crafted palace in one of Los Santos’ most exclusive neighborhoods, complete with breathtaking views, the finest amenities, and countless ways to customize and make it your own. Plus, stop the development of a mass surveillance network in an all-new action packed adventure — along with exquisite new vehicles to collect, the return of a familiar face, and much more. See full details at the Rockstar Newswire.

title: Live A Superyacht Life with Lavish Rewards
contents: Float towards the horizon and chart a course for the next era of Los Santos luxury like a real mogul. Set sail in A Superyacht Life this week and be rewarded handsomely with 5X GTA$ and RP. Go to the bridge of your Galaxy Super Yacht or dial up Captain Darcy to get under way or begin your nautical adventures with a 40% discount on any Galaxy model at DockTease. Completing three A Superyacht Life Missions will accomplish the Weekly Challenge, landing you the Vibrant Check Smoking Jacket in addition to GTA$100,000. Speaking of moguls, Ray Trotman is posing as an art connoisseur after stealing a priceless piece from the San Andreas Gallery of Modern Art. Use a chopper, EMPs, and retinal scans to take it back, and get 4X GTA$ for completing The Fine Art File, this week’s FIB Priority File. Garment Factory owners can launch FIB Files using the Darnell Inc. app. {STEAM_CLAN_IMAGE}/6144970/a6a8e6020c8a76c976be99660df70e12bf4966be.jpg AQUARIUS UPGRADE Upgrade your buoyant home away from home. Current Orion or Pisces owners can graduate to the luxurious Aquarius Super Yacht, the most expensive and luxurious Galaxy model available, for a nominal fee of GTA$1. If you don’t own one yet, get in on the fun by taking GTA$2,000,000 off the price of the Aquarius, plus an additional 40% off on top of that, when shopping for Galaxy Super Yachts on the DockTease website. Any Upgrades and Modifications you make from there will also be 40% off. Seek out less fortunate vessels and locate Shipwrecks to collect 2X GTA$ and RP from all chests. SPECIAL BLACK FRIDAY DISCOUNTS Chase your holiday meal down with a veritable buffet of Black Friday desserts, including some of the highest discounts ever offered on select vehicles below, along with 50% off a portfolio of hot properties — available from November 27 through December 3: — Mammoth Avenger – 70% off — Benefactor Terrorbyte – 50% off — Mammoth F-160 Raiju (Plane) – 40% off — Imponte Deluxo (Sports Classic) – 40% off — And more See full event details at the Rockstar Newswire.

title: Double Down on Luxury at The Diamond Casino & Resort
contents: For those looking to elevate their status to aid their quest for upcoming luxury real estate opportunities, the deck is stacked in your favor at The Diamond Casino & Resort this week. Claim a free Casino Master Penthouse to take advantage of The Diamond’s amenities, including Double Rewards on Casino Story and Casino Work Missions, plus get double daily Casino Chips. Anyone with an Arcade (30% off this week) can raid the vault for 2X Rewards in the Diamond Casino Heist Finale while GTA+ Members can get guaranteed Diamonds in the Casino Vault. Once you’ve mined those opportunities, there’s more to be made on the racetrack, with 2X GTA$ and RP on a new Community Race Series and 3X GTA$ and RP in the high stakes world of Open Wheel Races. See full event details at the Rockstar Newswire

title: Lay a Proper Foundation in New Listings
contents: There's a new entrant in the Los Santos high-end real estate scene, and they're making moves into some of the most exclusive neighborhoods. Prix Luxury Real Estate has ambitious plans, bringing new unrivaled mansion properties to this lucrative market in December. As part of the consortium overseeing these new developments, Mr. Faber sees the opportunity to strengthen his own bottom line, and he knows just the right person to advance his plans. Clear out squatters, procure construction materials, and motivate contractors in New Listings — three new missions now available in GTA Online that bestow double GTA$ and RP (4X for GTA+ Members). Help transform the face of Los Santos luxury real estate by completing all three, and you’ll be granted their preferred rate — a GTA$2,000,000 discount — when these properties hit the market in December. This week also brings executive bonuses to aid in the acquisition of capital resources, and look for additional opportunities throughout the month to take advantage of special bonuses and offers as you pursue your future palatial estate. {STEAM_CLAN_IMAGE}/45517848/becfabf2c4c15e7b153fb53d5c9042805e9ed046.jpg VERY IMPORTANT PRIX In preparation for their arrival on the Los Santos luxury property scene, Prix Luxury Real Estate is rolling out their new VIP program to welcome upwardly mobile homeowners into the elite. Complete all three New Listings missions by December 7 to ascend into the Gold Tier, rewarding you with a GTA$1,000,000 bonus (within 72 hours of completion), the Black Rockstar Varsity Crewneck, and a preferred rate (GTA$2,000,000 off) all Prix Luxury Real Estate listings arriving in December. Those who play GTA Online between November 13 and December 7 will qualify as a Black Tier VIP. Claim a FREE Übermacht Revolter (Sports) wrapped with the chic Sessanta Nove Monogram livery at the Luxury Autos showroom in Rockford Hills, and receive a collection of high-end fashion items befitting your elevated status. FREE EXECUTIVE OFFICE Don’t let perfectly good office space sit idle — put it to good use by claiming the Lombank West Executive Office for free this week. Become a wheeling-dealing, limousine-riding, jet-flying CEO with access to the SecuroServ network, VIP Work and Challenges, and more. Prefer another location? All other Executive Office Properties are 50% off, as are their Upgrades, Modifications, and Garage expansions through November 19. See full event details at the Rockstar Newswire.

title: GTA+ Members Can Claim a Free Enus Paragon S Sports Car
contents: Moving up in the world often requires charging forward at breakneck speed. GTA+ Members can experience it for themselves behind the wheel of the luxurious Enus Paragon S (Sports), free to claim at The Vinewood Car Club in GTA Online through December 8. Indulge in all the latest benefits, including discounts on luxury aircraft, new Chameleon Paints and in-game apparel, and more. GET GTA ONLINE INCLUDED WITH GTA+ Now anyone can play GTA Online on current generation consoles with a GTA+ Membership. If you have yet to join the millions of GTA Online players on PS5 and Xbox Series X|S, now is the perfect time to experience its wealth of upgrades and improvements, and get a range of special GTA Online benefits, access to even more Rockstar Games titles in the GTA+ Games Library, and more with a GTA+ Membership. CLAIM THE ENUS PARAGON S LUXURY SPORTS CAR Experience luxury like never before and look like a billion bucks behind the wheel of the Enus Paragon S. GTA+ Members can claim it for free with a 76 Camo livery from The Vinewood Car Club. Agency owners can add a Remote Control Unit or Missile Lock-on Jammer Imani Tech upgrade to infuse this exquisite sports car with some high-tech functionality. See full event details at the Rockstar Newswire

title: Claim a Free Benefactor Krieger Supercar in GTA Online
contents: Now through November 5, claim a free Benefactor Krieger (Super) in GTA Online and add this well-rounded hypercar to your vehicle collection. Just head into GTA Online and visit the Legendary Motorsport site, where the Krieger will be discounted from its regular GTA$2,875,000 price all the way down to GTA$0. You can also claim a seasonal orange and black version of the Krieger at the Luxury Autos showroom with some cosmetic upgrades applied for a nominal GTA$ fee.

title: Claim a Declasse Weaponized Tampa and Other Treats with GTA+
contents: GTA+ Members can defend themselves from ghosts and ghouls by claiming the Declasse Weaponized Tampa (Muscle) as Halloween eeriness escalates in GTA Online. Haul in a plastic pumpkin full of GTA$ with bonuses on Document Forgery Sell Missions and Counterfeit Cash Sell Missions, 50% off Biker Business Upgrades and Modifications, 4X Rewards for the Featured Series, and more through November 5. {STEAM_CLAN_IMAGE}/45517848/621cdb86609aef116fa0d59a229692035e9ed93e.jpg DECLASSE WEAPONIZED TAMPA Clear a path through the Halloween chaos with a Declasse Weaponized Tampa. This classic muscle car comes equipped with a top-mounted minigun and industrial-grade armor. Available upgrades include Front Missile Launchers, Rear-Firing Mortar, and Proximity Mines. Treat yourself and claim it directly from The Vinewood Car Club, wrapped in the limited-time Santo Capra Coins livery. NEW BRONZE CHAMELEON PAINTS Give your ride a fresh burnished finish with new Anodized Bronze Pearl Chameleon Paint and Anodized Bronze Pearl Chameleon Wheel Paint, available for free from any Vehicle Workshop. See full event details at the Rockstar Newswire.

title: Celebrate Spooky Season as Halloween Haunts Los Santos
contents: Halloween descends on Southern San Andreas throughout October with a bubbling cauldron of chaos. There are reports of UFO sightings, bizarre transformations, and many more tricks and treats across GTA Online. Take on a new Slasher mode inside the claustrophobic Ramius submarine, or fight it out in returning favorites Beast vs. Slasher, Judgement Day, and Condemned. Halloween also brings boo-sted payouts and more in October, starting with 2X GTA$ and RP on Bunker Sell Missions and 30% off Bunkers and their Upgrades & Modifications this week. Get into the sinister spirit with free Halloween Masks and discounted spooky vehicles like the LCC Sanctus (Motorcycle) and Albany Lurcher (Muscle), the returning Albany Fränken Stange (Sports Classic) and Chariot Romero Hearse (Sedan), and more. Also, celebrate the Mid-Autumn Festival in GTA Online. Play anytime through October 8 to get the Red Yeti Fall Cap and may your future be as bright as a full moon over Los Santos. ZOMBIE SURVIVALS RETURN There’s double trouble this month as Cayo Perico Survival and Ludendorff Cemetery Survival both return to GTA Online for a limited time, bringing tides of zombies to party-fueled paradise and snowy small town alike. Return to El Rubio’s island and North Yankton to tear through Waves of the undead, hulking juggernauts, armored conquistadors, splitters, possessed animals and their trainers, zombie DJs, and more. Cayo Perico Survival returns to pay out 2X GTA$ and RP from October 2–8, and Ludendorff Cemetery Survival will deal out Triple Rewards when it returns October 23–November 5. NEW RAMIUS SLASHER The latest twist on this Halloween classic puts you aboard the pitch-dark confines of the Ramius submarine. You’ll need to rely on your remaining senses to navigate multiple decks, survive combat at close quarters, and evade a watery grave. The Slasher begins each round armed with a Shotgun while the Hunted can use Flashlights to navigate the darkness. After three minutes, the Hunted get Shotguns and the stalker becomes the stalked. Fight it out beneath the waves in Slasher (Ramius Submarine) to earn 2X GTA$ and RP as part of the Featured Series from October 16–22. Previous Slasher modes also return to GTA Online throughout October. RETURNING HALLOWEEN FAVOURITES Slasher isn’t the only Adversary Mode making a grisly return. Each week in October, a different Halloween-themed mode will be included in the Featured Series with Double Rewards (all stacking to 4X for GTA+ Members): October 2–8: Beast vs. Slasher October 9–15: Judgement Day October 16–22: Slasher (Ramius Submarine) October 23–29: Condemned October 30–November 5: Slasher (includes Ramius Submarine) There are plenty more off-kilter events across Los Santos throughout the month: look to the skies mid-month to spot UFOs hovering and abducting the unsuspecting, and help local investigators Ghosts Exposed by photographing evidence of the supernatural. Plus, collect Jack O’ Lanterns all month long to get bonus GTA$ and more. UNEARTH THE VINEWOOD UNDEAD COLLECTION Starting October 2, complete the first three weeks of Weekly Challenges this month to receive the Vinewood Undead Collection in time for Halloween — a bundle of rewards consisting of the new Slasher Clown Outfit, the rare Please Stop Me Mask, Vinewood Zombie Tee, and the all-over Skulls livery for the Mammoth Avenger. For an added treat, all Weekly Challenges this month also reward double the usual GTA$ and include collectible Halloween Masks. October 2–8: Survive two Waves in a Survival without dying to earn GTA$200,000 and the Brown Vintage Zombie Mask (required to unlock the Vinewood Undead Collection). October 9–15: Complete three Taxi Fares to claim GTA$200,000 and the Weathered Vintage Mummy Mask (required to unlock the Vinewood Undead Collection). October 16–22: Win one Adversary Mode to earn GTA$200,000 and the Brown Vintage Werewolf Mask (required to unlock the Vinewood Undead Collection). October 23–29: Survive four Waves in a Survival without dying to earn GTA$200,000 and the Gray Jumping Spider Mask. October 30–November 5: Win one Adversary Mode to earn GTA$200,000 and the Gray Hooded Skull Mask. HALLOWEEN COMMUNITY SERIES The Community Series is getting in on the frightful antics this month too, featuring new Jobs each week, including costumed Deathmatches, haunted racetracks by shervera1980 and Trixx74 strewn with pumpkins and coffins, and a gargantuan course designed by the talented Mr_Kevson.

title: Secure the New Spy Shots Livery for the Överflöd Suzume
contents: Speed into the mainframe behind the wheel of the Överflöd Suzume, a Scandinavian supercar featured in the Money Fronts update that’s on sale for the first time ever this week (20% off) and wrapped in the new Spy Shots livery. Available with the Spy Shots livery at the Luxury Autos showroom and also available stock from Legendary Motorsport. GET DOUBLE REWARDS AND MORE FROM GERALD Gerald doesn’t talk much because he prefers to let his reputation speak for him. Solidify his legacy by assisting him in Gerald Contact Missions (including his exit strategy in Gerald’s Last Play) for 2X GTA$ and RP. Completing three Gerald’s Last Play missions will satisfy the Weekly Challenge and result in an extra GTA$100,000. 2X GTA$ AND RP ON G’S CACHE Pick up G’s Cache drops in assorted locations throughout Los Santos for bonus supplies. In addition to paying out 2X GTA$ and RP, collect G’s Cache once and complete all six Gerald’s Last Play missions to receive a GTA$500,000 bonus within 72 hours of completion. 2X GTA$ AND RP ON ASSAULT ON ATT-16 Engage in an all-out battle across Fort Zancudo and the USS Luxington aircraft carrier in Assault on ATT-16 — an elaborate multi-stage Adversary Mode that’s paying out Double Rewards to all competitors on either side of the conflict this week. See full event details at the Rockstar Newswire.

title: The Neighborhood Watch Event Continues: Get the Winter LSPD Officer Uniform and More
contents: The Neighborhood Watch Event enters its second week with an opportunity to unlock another LSPD uniform. Engage in off-the-books Dispatch Work for Vincent with any eligible Law Enforcement Vehicle, and earn 2X GTA$ and RP (4X for GTA+ Members) all week long. Complete three Dispatch Work assignments to satisfy the Neighborhood Watch Event Weekly Challenge and get the Winter LSPD Officer w/ Tie Outfit in addition to a GTA$100,000 prize. Meet up with Vincent once you’ve completed the Slush Fund mission in The Cluckin’ Bell Farm Raid to unlock a Law Enforcement Vehicle. Once inside an eligible vehicle, you can request Dispatch Work or accept Vincent’s invitation to get cracking. You’ll also need to relinquish your CEO, VIP, or MC President status to maintain a low profile while working undercover. LAST CHANCE: LAW ENFORCEMENT VEHICLES Tackle Dispatch Work with these discounted decommissioned Law Enforcement Vehicles from Warstock Cache & Carry: Western Police Bike – 15% off Invetero Coquette D10 Pursuit– 25% off Vapid Caracara Pursuit – 25% off Canis Terminus Patrol – 25% off Willard Outreach Faction – 25% off Vapid Dominator FX Interceptor – 35% off Bravado Greenwood Cruiser – 35% off Bravado Dorado Cruiser – 35% off Declasse Impaler LX Cruiser – 35% off Declasse Impaler SZ Cruiser – 35% off Vapid Stanier LE Cruiser – 35% off Bravado Gauntlet Interceptor – 35% off Vapid Unmarked Cruiser – 35% off GTA+ Members can still claim a free Canis Terminus Patrol at The Vinewood Car Club showroom, plus take advantage of stacked discounts this week on the Coquette D10 Pursuit, Caracara Pursuit, and Outreach Faction on display in the showroom. GET THE WINTER PARK RANGER OUTFIT This week Declasse Park Ranger (Emergency) owners will receive the Winter Park Ranger w/ Tie Outfit (delivered within 72 hours of login). Look the part as you capture snapshots of the Southern San Andreas animal kingdom in Wildlife Photography that pays 2X GTA$ and RP (4X for GTA+ Members) through September 24. See full event details at the Rockstar Newswire.

title: GTA+ Members Can Claim a Free Canis Terminus Patrol Law Enforcement Vehicle
contents: GTA+ Members can now claim the rugged and versatile Canis Terminus Patrol Law Enforcement Vehicle for free at The Vinewood Car Club. Plus, there are stackable bonuses on Bail Office Targets and Dispatch Work, and much more to take advantage of through October 8. This is also the final week of the GTA Online End of Summer GTA$ Giveaway, so signing up by September 17 will get you an additional one-time GTA$1,000,000 bonus as a Member. GET THE CANIS TERMINUS PATROL Upgrade your fleet with the Canis Terminus Patrol — a tactical variant of the off-road SUV used by Los Santos’ law enforcement — free to claim for all GTA+ Members at The Vinewood Car Club. Outfitted to handle high-risk operations and eligible for upgrades like the Missile Lock-On Jammer, this Law Enforcement Vehicle is perfect for tackling Dispatch Work, which is awarding 2X GTA$ and RP for GTA+ Members through October 8, (stacking to 4X Rewards now through September 24). GTA+ Members can also take advantage of discounts on the Coquette D10 Pursuit, Caracara Pursuit, and Outreach Faction on display in The Vinewood Car Club showroom, and any Law Enforcement Vehicles claimed or purchased there do not require completion of the Slush Fund mission from The Cluckin’ Bell Farm Raid to unlock. {STEAM_CLAN_IMAGE}/45517848/d1c252c480f4ce326ee330b410b85d26bafbbe53.jpg SUIT UP WITH THE PURPLE GÜFFY CARDIGAN AND LOS SANTOS MAP TEE Walk into any penthouse party wearing the bold Purple Güffy Cardigan on and pay homage to the streets that made you with the Los Santos Map Tee, both automatically added to the wardrobe of all active GTA+ Members through October 8. BAIL OFFICE BONUSES AND DISCOUNTS Turn fugitives into fast cash with 2X GTA$ and RP on Standard and Most Wanted Bail Office Targets, with payouts surging to 4X from September 18 through September 24. If you’re new to the business, this is the perfect time to bust in. Bail Office Properties and all associated upgrades and modifications are 50% off, exclusively for GTA+ Members from Maze Bank Foreclosures. See full event details at the Rockstar Newswire.

title: Neighborhood Watch Event: Cop the New LSPD Outfit and More
contents: Officer Vincent Effenburger and the citizens of the Greater Los Santos area are counting on you to stem the tide of LSPD corruption. By doing so you can add a flashy new police outfit to your repertoire. To aid in your citizen policing efforts, Warstock Cache & Carry is slashing prices on all decommissioned Law Enforcement Vehicles (GTA+ Members can also claim a free Canis Terminus Patrol as part of their latest Member benefits). NEIGHBORHOOD WATCH EVENT Protect and serve this week by completing three Dispatch Work missions to achieve a special Neighborhood Watch Event Weekly Challenge and get the Summer LSPD Officer Outfit along with a GTA$100,000 bonus. Next week, you’ll have the opportunity to unlock an additional uniform — stay tuned for details. {STEAM_CLAN_IMAGE}/45517848/132813e7b00cd3bd89b1e27b3b0cacc5320c2f16.jpg ALL LAW ENFORCEMENT VEHICLES ON SALE In addition to completing the first mission for The Cluckin’ Bell Farm Raid, you’ll need to own a decommissioned Law Enforcement Vehicle for Dispatch Work. Luckily, Warstock Cache & Carry is running a fire sale for the next two weeks. GET THE SUMMER PARK RANGER OUTFIT Do you yearn to protect nature instead of the loud-mouthed hikers looting and polluting the trail? Prove it with the Declasse Park Ranger SUV (35% off) and receive the Summer Park Ranger Outfit (existing vehicle owners will also have the Summer Park Ranger Outfit added to their wardrobe within 72 hours of login). Owners who log in next week will also be gifted the Winter Park Ranger w/ Tie Outfit. See full event details at the Rockstar Newswire.

title: Double Up with 2X GTA$ and RP on Cayo Perico Survival This Week
contents: Cayo Perico is overrun with all manner of undead threats. It’s unclear if the scourge stems from a batch of bad party favors or an ancient curse, but one thing’s clear: they’re out for blood. Mow them down to enable your escape via the landing zone, or take on endless Waves and see how long you can last while reaping 2X GTA$ and RP on Cayo Perico Survival (4X for GTA+ Members) through September 10. {STEAM_CLAN_IMAGE}/45517848/50028a730df76229e51afd5c3703f794cb76b417.jpg CAYO PERICO SURVIVAL BONUS REWARDS Get the I Survived Cayo Perico Tee for playing the new mode (delivered within 72 hours of playing), and vanquish all ten Waves of any Survival this week to collect The Buccaneer Outfit and GTA$100,000 for completing the Weekly Challenge. Struggling to reach Wave 10? Try these tips: - Regular Zombies will speed up if a DJ is playing music. Take out the DJs to slow down the onslaught. - Don’t get overrun. Coordinate with teammates to take out both halves of a Splitter in double time. - Conquistadors are only vulnerable to melee attacks, and their Muskets take a long time to reload. Get up close and handle them quickly. - Follow the Undead Panther Trainer’s red trail and take them out quickly, otherwise you’ll need to keep fighting off lethal attacks from big cats. Beyond that, remember to use space to your advantage, stock up on Snacks before you ship out, and don’t be afraid to fire away — any ammunition you use during Survivals will be restocked. Speaking of big cats, rep local wildlife by playing GTA Online anytime this week to receive the Panther Tour Jacket, free of charge. See full event details at the Rockstar Newswire.

title: Battle Hordes of Undead in the New Cayo Perico Survival
contents: Your favorite island paradise just came down with a deadly case of party fever. As if a major narcotrafficking island wasn’t dangerous enough, it’s now been overrun by the undead — and maybe it’s the drugs or the tropical climate, but this time they’ve got a whole lot weirder. Cut your way through waves of undead, including conquistadors armed with muskets, Panther Trainers and their feral pets, swarms of Splitters, and more in the new Cayo Perico Survival. Fight through these hordes and make your way to the airstrip — then pray your evacuation plane doesn’t take too long. Welcome to the tourist trap. 2X REWARDS ON CAYO PERICO SURVIVAL Get 2X GTA$ and RP (4X for GTA+ Members) in the new Cayo Perico Survival through September 10. Equip an arsenal and join the fracas by launching the Cayo Perico Series from your in-game phone or heading to the palm tree corona down in Terminal. GET THE I SURVIVED CAYO PERICO TEE AND MORE Even if you can’t make it past the initial wave, everyone gets a souvenir in the form of the I Survived Cayo Perico Tee just for braving these reanimated ravers (delivered within 72 hours of playing). Pirates abide by a code — no prey, no pay. You can earn The Buccaneer Outfit plus GTA$100,000 in loot by completing all ten waves of a Survival through September 10. See full event details at the Rockstar Newswire.

title: Get Up to GTA$2,000,000 in the GTA Online End of Summer GTA$ Giveaway
contents: Now through September 17, anyone who plays GTA Online will receive a special GTA$ cash infusion. Everyone gets a one-time GTA$1,000,000 boost, while GTA+ Members will receive an additional GTA$1,000,000 (including anyone who subscribes and plays between August 21 and September 17). Bonuses will hit your account within 72 hours of logging in. SIMEON'S BIG BONUSES Mr. Yetarian is looking to clear inventory fast and paying extra for your hustle. Respond to his Export Requests by tracking down specific vehicles across the city and delivering them back to his garage in one piece to earn 3X GTA$ and RP. Plus, earn 2X GTA$ and RP on all Simeon Contact Missions — from quick repos to full-blown recovery operations. GTA+ Members get even bigger payouts with 4X GTA$ and RP. Reach employee of the month by completing the entire Premium Deluxe Repo Work mission lineup to receive a GTA$500,000 bonus, deposited within 72 hours of completion, while completing three for the Weekly Challenge will get you an extra GTA$100,000. See full event details at the Rockstar Newswire.

title: GTA+ Members Can Race Toward Rewards with the Pegassi Torero XO and More
contents: GTA+ Members can claim a sleek supercar built for straight-line dominance and high-speed finesse at The Vinewood Car Club, along with a variety of other Member benefits — Atomic racing apparel, new Green/Red Flip Chameleon Paints, and more. Plus, a new Cayo Perico Survival arrives in GTA Online on August 28, and GTA+ Members will get 4X Rewards in this new mode through September 10. CLAIM THE PEGASSI TORERO XO The Pegassi Torero XO (Super) blends sharp design, jet-engine acceleration, and corner-hugging precision into a singular package. From tearing through Vinewood Hills to running a hot lap around the LS Car Meet, the Torero XO is built to perform. Head to The Vinewood Car Club to test drive and claim it for free. See full event details at the Rockstar Newswire.

title: Drift Week Slides into GTA Online with a Free Vehicle and Street-Ready Upgrades
contents: NVIDIA DLSS 4 UPDATE Players on PC Enhanced can now take advantage of the latest NVIDIA driver update bringing DLSS 4 to GTAV and GTA Online with new Multi Frame Generation for improved performance. Read more about it here. Anyone who already owns the Legacy version of GTAV and GTA Online for PC can still upgrade to the Enhanced version for free — which offers a wide array of improvements to GTAV on PC, including ray traced ambient occlusion and global illumination, new vehicles and upgrades at Hao’s Special Works (HSW), and much more. DRIFT WEEK Los Santos power slides into Drift Week with panache. Claim a brand-new drift vehicle for free and open up a world of corner-hugging precision with Drift Tuning Upgrades on four more rides. Plus, earn race rewards along with doubled payouts across some of Los Santos’ most intense showdowns. The Drift Tuning Upgrade is now available for the Bravado Gauntlet Hellfire (Muscle), Annis Hardy (Sedan), Vapid Dominator FX (Muscle, 50% off), and Dinka Chavos V6 (Sedan, 50% off) by visiting Hao’s Special Works inside the Los Santos Car Meet, or The Vinewood Club Garage Vehicle Workshop if you’re a GTA+ Member. All four of these vehicles are currently on display in the Premium Deluxe Motorsport showroom — visit Simeon’s outpost to browse, test, and purchase them on the spot. Plus, both the Vapid Dominator FX and Dinka Chavos V6 are available at 50% off this week, making it the perfect time to upgrade your lineup and dial in that perfect drift build. CLAIM A FREE DECLASSE DRIFT WALTON L35 FOR A LIMITED-TIME The Declasse Drift Walton L35 (Off-Road) is a reimagining of the classic pickup for the drift scene. It boasts an aggressive stance, street style, and a full slate of customization upgrades to match. Claim it for free from the Southern San Andreas Super Autos website or get it from Premium Deluxe Motorsport’s showroom with only a small upcharge for some select modifications. But hurry, this special edition leaves the lot on August 27, so grab it now and turn every on-ramp into a playground. See full event details at the Rockstar Newswire.

title: Cayo Perico Motor Wars: New Mode with 4X Rewards for GTA+ Members
contents: The lush, sprawling grounds of El Rubio’s private island are now a chaotic new battleground in Cayo Perico Motor Wars, a tropical twist on the classic mode that’s dealing out 2X GTA$ and RP for the next two weeks. Drop into one of six fast-shrinking areas that force you into a fight, then survive and dominate to take the win. Whether you take to the skies, control the roads, or stalk the underbrush, supremacy is the only goal. Expect an arsenal of weapons, vehicles, and shifting tactical opportunities — so stay light on your feet. GTA+ Members take it further with a staggering 4X GTA$ and RP through August 6. Launch this new Adversary Mode by joining the Cayo Perico Series. Pull up your iFruit and use Quick Join, or head over to the blip on your map in Terminal. {STEAM_CLAN_IMAGE}/45517848/9362141a30960cd7858a106f594c0093c232695c.jpg GET THE GOLD GUN NECKLACE Survive by completing a session of Cayo Perico Motor Wars to receive the Gold Gun Necklace as a stylish souvenir, delivered within 72 hours of completion. Plus, make three Safeguard deliveries to complete the Weekly Challenge and earn a cool GTA$100,000 bonus. See full event details at the Rockstar Newswire.

title: GTA+ Members Can Claim Their Free Bravado Buffalo EVX
contents: GTA+ Members can now claim a free Bravado Buffalo EVX (Muscle) from The Vinewood Car Club. The latest benefits also include complimentary apparel from Manor, new Light Blue Pearl Chameleon Paints, stackable bonuses on Mr. Faber Work, Double GTA$ from Street Dealers, and the addition of Grand Theft Auto III – The Definitive Edition on mobile to the GTA+ Games Library. CLAIM A FREE BRAVADO BUFFALO EVX The Bravado Buffalo EVX (Muscle) delivers punchy acceleration, razor-sharp handling, and clean lines that look just as good charging through Vinewood Hills as they do parked outside your latest front. This formidable all-electric powerhouse is also HSW Upgrade and Imani Tech compatible — head to The Vinewood Car Club to test drive the Buffalo EVX (Muscle) and add it directly to your garage for free as a GTA+ Member. See full event details at the Rockstar Newswire.

title: Solve Dilemmas for Mr. Faber’s Clients and Get Double Rewards
contents: The evasive puppeteer behind Southern San Andreas' money laundering syndicate requires your assistance. Locate lost valuables, sabotage enemy outfits, and more in Mr. Faber Work — in exchange for 2X GTA$ and RP. Mr. Faber is an avowed fan of multiplying return on investment, so payouts also stack up to 4X for GTA+ Members this week. Plus, additionally compensate yourself with a GTA$100,000 bonus for completing five Mr. Faber Work Missions to fulfill the Weekly Challenge. Completing Mr. Faber Work will increase Heat at the business front it’s launched from. If it reaches the maximum, your passive income will stall. Doing legal work — washing vehicles at the Hands On Car Wash, making deliveries for Smoke on the Water, or chauffeuring tourists at Higgins Helitours — will get things humming again. Start GTA Online: Money Fronts by answering Martin Madrazo’s call to meet Mr. Faber at LSIA and use the For Sale sign outside the Hands On Car Wash to purchase your first Money Laundering operation. Once you’re set up, you can launch Money Laundering Missions or legal work from anywhere by calling up Raf. {STEAM_CLAN_IMAGE}/45517848/61f5d6903ec488744a9ab507abcafe82c633c76b.jpg 2X GTA$ AND RP ON TIME TRIALS Vying against other racers is a challenge, but there's something particularly nerve-racking when the opponent is a ticking clock. Compete in Time Trials to set personal bests, aim for track records, and earn Double Rewards through July 23. 2X GTA$ AND RP ON G’S CACHE Pick up G’s Cache daily dead drops and reap Double Rewards through July 23. When one is close by, look for a red flashing light and listen for a beeping sound. Activating the Bureau Tech collectible scanner upgrade for the Terrorbyte will also reveal its location when nearby. See full event details at the Rockstar Newswire.

title: Double Rewards for Smoke on the Water Money Laundering Missions
contents: Sabotage your dispensary’s competition at the root in Smoke on the Water Money Laundering Missions, dishing out Double Rewards (4X for GTA+ Members) through July 16. Intercept NOOSE raids, frame enemy gangs for hits on rival dealers, collect canisters of cash, and more. If you’re just entering the world of Money Fronts, start by acquiring the Hands On Car Wash from Maze Bank Foreclosures and you can expand your new money laundering business from there to add Smoke on the Water — along with Higgins Helitours — via the laptop in the office (or via Maze Bank Foreclosures once the Hands On Car Wash is purchased). Smoke on the Water also generates a boost on earnings from Weed Farm Sell Missions, so take advantage this week by growing your criminal business portfolio with 30% off Weed Farms. Plus, extra passive income from your existing network (Arcades, Biker Businesses, Bunkers, etc.) will be routed to the safe at the Hands On Car Wash. The more existing enterprises you own, the more bonus income is generated! Completing any three Smoke on the Water missions, including legal delivery work, will satisfy the latest Weekly Challenge and land you a GTA$100,000 bonus. 2X PRODUCTION SPEEDS ON BIKER WEED FARM AND NIGHTCLUB ORGANIC PRODUCE STOCK Something’s gotten into the crops around Los Santos, spurring them to grow twice as quick, resulting in 2X Production Speeds for both Biker Weed Farm Stock and Organic Produce in Nightclubs. See full event details at the Rockstar Newswire.

title: Embrace the Freedom of the Open Road in GTA Online This Independence Day Weekend
contents: This week’s GTA Online festivities put the spotlight on America's vibrant car culture and appetite for rebellion with 4X GTA$ and RP on Land Races, Double Rewards on Auto Shop Client Jobs and Tow Truck Services, and a new Independence Day livery for the Declasse Walton L35 Stock (Off-Road). {STEAM_CLAN_IMAGE}/6144970/65894876b3b2dc024a920a450b1761b7507a04fc.jpg INDEPENDENCE DAY DISCOUNTS Roll into the holiday weekend with savings on vehicles, properties, and more star-spangled items. Get 40% off the Western Sovereign (Motorcycle) and Vapid Liberator (Off-Road) — two American-made icons built for tearing up asphalt and dirt. Benny’s Original Motor Works is offering 40% off all Conversion Upgrades, perfect for testing the limits of street legal requirements. Meanwhile, serve the skies with military precision with 50% off the JoBuilt P-996 LAZER (Plane), and celebrate with a bang by picking up the Musket and Firework Launcher for 50% off at the Gun Van. Stock up with Free Firework Launcher Ammo, also available at the Gun Van and Ammu-Nation. Expand your criminal empire with 30% off Bunkers, Nightclubs, Cocaine Lockups, and Salvage Yard Properties. Plus, take advantage of 40% off a collection of holiday-ready gear and liveries, accessories and apparel. BEER HATS AND MORE IN BUSINESS BATTLE CRATES Beer may not be an American invention, but the Beer Hat certainly is. Look for the Pißwasser, Benedict, Patriot, and Supa Wet Beer Hats in Business Battle Crates, along with the festive Statue of Happiness T-Shirt. See full event details at the Rockstar Newswire.

title: The Överflöd Suzume Supercar and New Safeguard Deliveries Now in GTA Online
contents: The Överflöd Suzume (Super) spent most of its life shrouded in secrecy. First as a classified sketch, then as a super-limited concept car, and now after a week of exclusive early access for GTA+ Members it’s finally unleashed upon the general populace in all its glory. Join the vanguard by purchasing one from Legendary Motorsport. Or sign up for GTA+ and claim it for free at The Vinewood Car Club through July 16. {STEAM_CLAN_IMAGE}/45517848/ba6ebf84ed2a32b3b7ddcb780946bde985e8c473.jpg COLLECT MORE NEW VEHICLES GTA Online: Money Fronts features a collection of new vehicles to acquire, with a number of them debuting today in dealerships across Southern San Andreas. Nimbly outmaneuver adversaries in the Annis Minimus (Sedan), get low with the Declasse Walton L35 Stock (Off-Road), or become the final boss of mid-life crises with the Declasse Tampa GT (Muscle). INTRODUCING THE GROTTI LSCM CHEETAH CLASSIC Car collectors with exquisite taste can also get behind the wheel of the Grotti LSCM Cheetah Classic (Sports Classic) — a uniquely styled version of the two-door coupe devised by the Los Santos Car Meet customizing collective that also includes a pre-installed Missile Lock-On Jammer. See full event details at the Rockstar Newswire.

title: GTA+ Members Get Early Access to Claim the New Överflöd Suzume Supercar
contents: With the launch of GTA Online: Money Fronts, GTA+ Members get early access to the sizzling new Överflöd Suzume supercar, wrapped in an exclusive livery and yours to claim for free through July 16. Members can also now spin The Diamond Casino & Resort’s Lucky Wheel twice a day. Clean up with 2X GTA$ and RP on the all new Money Laundering Missions, show out with new apparel and Chameleon Paints, and much more. CLAIM THE NEW ÖVERFLÖD SUZUME EARLY Get ahead of the curve with early access to the all-new Överflöd Suzume (Super) — a low-slung, high-performance supercar straight out of sci-fi, paired with the exclusive Cyber Graphics livery for an otherworldly edge. Head to The Vinewood Car Club to test it out or add it straight to your garage before the rest of Los Santos gets a look. The Vinewood Car Club also offers GTA+ Members an early access opportunity for two additional new vehicles — the Annis Minimus sedan and the Declasse Tampa GT muscle car. Test drive and purchase these at a discount before they're available to non-Members on June 26. GET AN EXTRA LUCKY WHEEL SPIN EVERY DAY Get a second spin at the Lucky Wheel each day at The Diamond Casino & Resort — the latest addition to the roster of persistent benefits available to GTA+ Members. Plus, claim 10X Daily Chips from the cashier on the main floor through July 16. Whether you’re doubling down at the tables or just flexing your VIP status, the house is feeling generous. 2X GTA$ AND RP ON NEW MONEY LAUNDERING MISSIONS Line your pockets with Double Rewards on every cash cleaning gig this month, from scrubbing secrets at the Hands On Car Wash, to cannabis courier work for Smoke on the Water, and hush-hush jobs flying out of Higgins Helitours. From June 17 – 25 Money Laundering Missions are awarding 2X GTA$ and RP to all players, which equates to a whopping 4X Rewards for GTA+ Members. Keep an eye out for additional extra bonuses on in the weeks ahead. 30% OFF THE NEW HANDS ON CAR WASH Give your criminal operations a squeaky-clean front by purchasing the Hands On Car Wash — your entry point to the new Money Laundering Missions in GTA Online: Money Fronts — and discounted at 30% off for GTA+ Members. Pull up your iFruit and head to Maze Bank Foreclosures to purchase the Hands On Car Wash, or go straight to the property location in South Los Santos. See full event details at the Rockstar Newswire.

title: GTA Online: Money Fronts
contents: Channel new revenue streams of clean and dirty income through iconic local businesses in Money Fronts, today’s new update in GTA Online. From the frenzied clubs of Tony Prince to El Rubio’s narcotrafficking empire, the power of Epsilon to the gold-tinted hijinks of Yusuf Amir — they’re all sustained by one thing: dirty filthy money. And you’ve just been summoned by the man who oversees it all. The head of San Andreas’ biggest money laundering network of shadowy financiers — the elusive Mr. Faber — has heard about you. And with the help of Martin Madrazo and Faber's fashionable fixer, Raf De Angelis, it's time for you two to form a mutually beneficial connection. {STEAM_CLAN_IMAGE}/45517848/370cb951b935d402ca4b28485c3841769d3e0d9d.jpg GET HANDS ON Start scrubbing your criminal network’s bottom line at the Hands On Car Wash, the perfect above-board establishment to run cover for a criminal conspiracy. Dirty money flows in from all manner of back channels as you disrupt and destroy rival operations, bolster earnings from your already established unlawful endeavors, and watch the squeaky-clean cash flow out. {STEAM_CLAN_IMAGE}/45517848/1ea89e2776ded3a9fea8ecde12e73707d4faf519.jpg SMOKE ON THE WATER Once you purchase the Hands On Car Wash, you can also expand your portfolio to include Smoke on the Water. Owning Vespucci Beach’s premier stash spot allows you to launder more money and run interference on rival grow operations. {STEAM_CLAN_IMAGE}/45517848/ee3970920f5fd888c9af77f06e499d2ad8c631d7.jpg HIGGINS HELITOURS Owning the Hands On Car Wash also opens up the ability to take over Higgins Helitours on the Vespucci Helipad. Use the business’ equipment to give tourists a bird’s-eye view of Los Santos out front while hauling valuable cargo and taking down smugglers out back — cutting into your competitors’ supply. In addition to legitimate business operations, each of the above also hides less-than-legal Money Laundering activities behind the scenes, utilizing each front’s strengths and resources to support your empire’s financial health. Calling up Raf or using the laptop inside your fronts can launch unique Money Laundering missions — those launched from the Hands On Car Wash will pay out 2X GTA$ and RP this week, and other businesses will be receiving boosts in the weeks ahead. Earnings from these laundering ops are stored in the Duffel Bag in your Car Wash’s bedroom. {STEAM_CLAN_IMAGE}/45517848/ae336d050b5666e38c06f5f420267cf682a984d6.jpg IT'S ALL CONNECTED Getting into the laundering game benefits your existing criminal network, with extra income from your other established businesses funneling into your front operation, delivering the cash to the Car Wash safe. Owning the Car Wash also boosts all Counterfeit Cash Factory Sales from your MC business (30% off this week), while Smoke on the Water provides a bump to all Weed Farm Sales. Operating Higgins Helitours as a front results in a lift for all Air Freight Cargo. Money Laundering Missions raise suspicion from the authorities in the form of Heat on your various fronts. Businesses with Heat will be blipped with caution signals on the map and require you to cool things back down via legal activity before generating further passive income. Clean up customer vehicles at the Car Wash, then return them to the client for a cash payment. Delivering bales of organic product from Smoke on the Water and conducting landmark tours with the Higgins company Maverick also lowers any Heat that builds up on those respective ventures while also providing a payout. {STEAM_CLAN_IMAGE}/45517848/cc5db058436dc9465ddcd0a94e7290b26c7fc9c3.jpg MR. FABER WORK Professional money laundering services are in high demand, and Mr. Faber’s clients are not patient people. Lend your problem-solving expertise to the man behind the scenes and help his other clients in Mr. Faber Work by recovering stolen assets, escorting valuable cargo, and dealing with rival outfits. Use the laptop inside any of your Money Laundering Businesses — or call Raf directly — to assist with Mr. Faber Work for GTA$ and RP rewards, plus an added bonus once it’s been scrubbed of any traces of its shady origins. Completing Mr. Faber Work raises the Heat on the associated business it’s launched from, so remember to keep up appearances with legal activities to keep the funds rolling in uninterrupted. {STEAM_CLAN_IMAGE}/45517848/30161f83ad7424369fe3fb1541c650bff9053cda.jpg Money Fronts introduces six new vehicles, including the Överflöd Suzume, a supercar that’s available early to GTA+ Members through June 25 and free for Members to claim at The Vinewood Car Club until July 16. Bring the rustic vibes of Paleto Forest wherever you go with the Karin Woodlander SUV, and reinforce it like a San Andreas redwood with a Hao’s Special Works upgrade on PC Enhanced. The Karin Everon RS SUV takes the big ego energy of the previous Everon model and amplifies it to a level as obnoxious as the guy blasting reactionary country music on Vesp...

title: GTA Online: Money Fronts Coming June 17
contents: Take control of San Andreas’ biggest money laundering operation and clean up your criminal empire’s bottom line in Money Fronts — the latest GTA Online update arriving on June 17. Acquire iconic local businesses and use them to route earnings through a sophisticated and interconnected operation while hiding it from prying eyes. With the help of longstanding associate Martin Madrazo, you’ll connect with new advisors who will help you accumulate new business ventures and launder your dirty money while also infusing your accounts with legitimate income. With some creative bookkeeping and a little elbow grease, you’ll end up further enriched and the taxman will be none the wiser. See full event details at the Rockstar Newswire.

title: Hit the Jackpot Inside The Diamond Casino & Resort’s Vault
contents: Few places are more comforting in perilous times than The Diamond Casino & Resort — the crown jewel of the Los Santos entertainment scene. Besides the extra oxygen pumped into the HVAC system, The Diamond offers benefits and amenities to Master Penthouse owners and those who rescue the Casino and its staff from criminal schemes. On the other hand, there’s a jackpot waiting for you in the vault if you’re the one plotting and betting on its downfall. {STEAM_CLAN_IMAGE}/6144970/0126d811a4af2a81f394d5a053f0a91d13f3d4b2.jpg GUARANTEED DIAMONDS Once you’ve set up your base of operations underneath your Arcade, you can begin to plan The Diamond Casino Heist where you’ll break into and out of the casino vault — it’s guaranteed to contain Diamonds through June 16. See full event details at the Rockstar Newswire.

title: GTA+ Members Can Claim a Free Fathom FR36 Coupe
contents: Slide into the executive fast lane with a sleek Fathom FR36 (Coupe) — yours to claim for free as a GTA+ Member through June 16. Plus, accentuate your ride with new Anodized Champagne Pearl Chameleon Paints, stand out in the bold Strapz Patterned Sweatshirt and Jeans, and stack serious profits from 3X GTA$ and RP on VIP Work and Challenges and 2X GTA$ and RP on Special Cargo Sell Missions. {STEAM_CLAN_IMAGE}/45517848/07298a1a23ccab681d0ac426862d71a3cda4b023.jpg CLAIM A FREE FATHOM FR36 The Fathom FR36 (Coupe) fuses executive style with electric hybrid power and precision-engineered drift handling. The Vinewood Car Club edition comes wrapped in a Flames livery, adding some extra heat to its clean silhouette. GTA+ Members can claim it for free through June 16, and realize its full potential with a Drift Tuning Upgrade from the LS Car Meet. See full event details at the Rockstar Newswire.

title: Climb the Corporate Ladder in GTA Online with Executive Bonuses
contents: Savvy Executives and their trusted Associates are primed for a surge in profits this week as demand skyrockets for Mixed Goods and Special Vehicle Work. There’s serious money to be made by moving fast — sell GTA$300,000 worth of product across all business holdings to complete the Weekly Challenge and land a GTA$100,000 bonus. The Career Progress system on PC Enhanced keeps tabs on your journey to the top while dishing out rewards along the way. Complete Tier 1 of Further Adventures in Finance and Felony by becoming the CEO of your own Organization, onboarding an Associate, and completing a VIP Work mission. Accomplishing all of the Tier 4 challenges will even get you your own luxurious executive transport, a complimentary Enus Windsor Drop convertible. This is also the perfect time to level up operations by taking 30% off Executive Offices, Special Cargo Warehouses, and a trio of CEO-tier Buckingham aircraft. And if you’re a GTA+ Member, target the zenith of your Executive career with Double Rewards on Special Cargo Sell Missions and 3X GTA$ and RP on VIP Work and Challenges through June 16. {STEAM_CLAN_IMAGE}/45517848/029eaeeb2dd5cb97b54d0b66d69a5178299ac58c.jpg 3X GTA$ AND RP ON SPECIAL VEHICLE WORK Access the SecuroServ Network on the computer inside your Executive Office to launch a lucrative rampage in Special Vehicle Work — fighting off hacking attacks, exfiltrating client VIPs, and seizing assets, all while earning 3X GTA$ and RP through June 4. 2X GTA$ AND RP FOR EXPORTING MIXED GOODS Dodge criminals and cops alike as you transport in-demand cargo to the docks in Export Mixed Goods Missions in exchange for Double Rewards. See full event details at the Rockstar Newswire.

title: Profits Hit High Tide with Double Rewards on A Superyacht Life
contents: Seek adventure on the high seas and plunder Double Rewards all this week. Salvage sunken cargo, capsize enemy vessels, and fight off amphibious assaults in A Superyacht Life Contact Missions, paying out 2X GTA$ and RP through May 28. Plus, complete three A Superyacht Life Missions to fulfill the Weekly Challenge and claim GTA$100,000. Visit Captain Darcy on the bridge of your Galaxy Super Yacht (40% off this week) to get started. {STEAM_CLAN_IMAGE}/6144970/3a74f6024750b3ff8f140d3639e15e72ffc01493.jpg DOUBLE REWARDS ON SHIPWRECKS Comb the beaches, piers, and jetties around Southern San Andreas and you’ll earn 2X GTA$ and RP for locating daily Shipwrecks containing treasure. Pick up Outfit Scraps to unlock The Frontier Outfit as a reward. See full event details at the Rockstar Newswire.

title: Engage in Disruption to Earn Double on All FIB Files Finales
contents: Once you move into the Darnell Bros Garment Factory, get acquainted with Jodi Marshall and install the Darnell Inc. app on your iFruit, you can embark on the clandestine operations of The FIB Files. In addition to gunplay and evasive maneuvers, these multi-part operations require mastery of hacking, infiltration, and disruption. Putting these skills to good use will pay off since all FIB Files Finales — The Brute Force File, The Black Box File, The Fine Art File, and The Project Breakaway File — are paying out 2X GTA$ and RP this week. This boost also applies to this week’s Priority File (The Fine Art File). Playing with a crew makes it easier to grab items faster and prevents burdening one with carrying too much loot. All the FIB Files Finales feature three Elite Challenges that can be completed for extra GTA$, including an additional bonus for completing all three. Complete any three FIB Files Finales to fulfill the latest Weekly Challenge, and get a GTA$100,000 bonus. {STEAM_CLAN_IMAGE}/45517848/c59276fa9deb111c454bd4e72d6e625476216c6e.jpg DOUBLED PASSIVE INCOME FROM THE GARMENT FACTORY Aside from serving as the nerve center of your Agents of Sabotage operations, the Darnell Bros Garment Factory (30% off this week) will also bring in doubled Passive Income through May 21, which you can claim from the Wall Safe upstairs. GTA+ Members can fill their coffers extra quick this week with 4X Passive Income. Keep track of your headway and potential rewards from Agents of Sabotage in Career Progress. MERRYWEATHER SECURITY LIVERY FOR THE DH-7 IRON MULE Successfully completing The Titan Job from Oscar Guzman Flies Again anytime through May 21 will reward you with the limited-time Merryweather Security livery for the Buckingham DH-7 Iron Mule (Helicopter), delivered within 72 hours of completion. GTA+ Members earn 2X GTA$ & RP on The Titan Job this month to boot. See full event details at the Rockstar Newswire.

title: Secure the Bag with Bonuses on The Contract
contents: Being an elite celebrity fixer means doing whatever it takes — especially when a celebrity of Dr. Dre’s caliber calls. Recover Dre’s stolen phone loaded with unreleased tracks and sensitive intel in The Data Leaks and score a bonus by wrapping up his saga in the final mission. Join forces with the crew at F. Clinton & Partner to earn Double Rewards on Security Contracts. Those yet to launch their own operation can take 30% off Agency Properties and their Upgrades and Modifications, including the Vehicle Workshop and Imani Tech Upgrades. Step into Franklin and Lamar’s shoes in Double Down, explore brand-new Community Series Jobs, and pick up a free RPG at the Gun Van — all in homage to The Contract — through May 14. {STEAM_CLAN_IMAGE}/6144970/6978c6b49f15d3b30fe06c03c1baf8e8cf8f03cf.jpg 2X GTA$ AND RP ON THE DATA LEAKS Track down Dr. Dre’s stolen phone and exact revenge in The Data Leaks, now awarding 2X GTA$ and RP. Completing the finale will also satisfy the Weekly Challenge and net you an extra GTA$100,000. Swing by Luxury Autos to see the Declasse Granger 3600LX (SUV) in a calmer light — now 30% off. 2X GTA$ AND RP ON SECURITY CONTRACTS Whether you’re taking out rival gangs or rescuing high-profile clients, it’s all in a day’s work for Los Santos’ elite fixers. Use the computer in your Agency to dive into Security Contracts for Double Rewards. See full event details at the Rockstar Newswire.

title: Assert Dominance With the Free Mammoth Patriot Mil-Spec for GTA+ Members
contents: Wrestle control of strategic chokepoints in style with the Mammoth Patriot Mil-Spec (Off-Road), free to claim for all GTA+ Members through May 28. Plus, get bonus GTA$ and RP on The Titan Job finale from Oscar Guzman Flies Again, and enjoy the latest addition to the GTA+ Games Library — Bully, on compatible mobile devices. LAST CHANCE TO CLAIM THE GTA+ CLASSICS COLLECTION GTA+ Members across PS5, Xbox Series X|S, and the recently upgraded PC version have until May 28 to claim a selection of previously offered benefits that include: - A free-to-claim Principe Deveste Eight (Super) with a complimentary HSW Upgrade - HSW CMYK Glitch and HSW Orange Trip liveries for the Principe Deveste Eight - Off White Pearl Chameleon Paint and Off White Pearl Chameleon Wheel Paint - LS Customs Forwards Cap and Neck Gaiter - Gray Yeti Combat Shirt and Battle Pants - Gold Beat Off Earphones See full event details at the Rockstar Newswire.

title: Drivers Thrive with 4X GTA$ and RP on Open Wheel Races
contents: High speeds, outlandish production budgets, corporate sponsors, interpersonal drama — it’s hard to compete with the spectacle of Open Wheel Races. The circuit also promises an eye-popping 4X GTA$ and RP on the seven fan-favorite tracks returning to the Featured Series this week. Head over to Legion Square to compete. {STEAM_CLAN_IMAGE}/45517848/d916fa677986954bdfd1cb1303baf0c7a2cb8187.jpg 40% OFF OPEN WHEEL RACE CARS Get in prime overtake position with a custom Open Wheel race car. Take 40% off any of the four illustrious models available at Legendary Motorsport through May 7. Plus, win two Open Wheel Races to complete the Weekly Challenge and you’ll rake in an additional GTA$100,000. GET THE DARK MANOR SUIT Completing three Open Wheel Races this week will reward you with the Dark Manor Suit — available within 72 hours of completion. 2X GTA$ AND RP ON PAYPHONE HITS Due to ongoing FIB monitoring operations, the nature of Payphone Hits is best kept off the record. Executing wet-work operations against high-value targets is high-risk and high-reward, so you’ll be paid out 2X GTA$ and RP for completing them, while GTA+ Members’ payouts stack to a whopping 4X. See full event details at the Rockstar Newswire.

title: Double Rewards on Terrorbyte Client Jobs and Mobile Operations Missions
contents: Paige Harris is calling on skilled operators to take on Terrorbyte Client Jobs for a lucrative 2X GTA$ and RP through April 30. Owners of the Benefactor Terrorbyte can launch these high-stakes missions directly from the touchscreen terminal inside. If you haven’t already, you can get a hold of this high-tech beast at Warstock Cache & Carry. Complete three Terrorbyte Client Jobs to conquer the Weekly Challenge and score an extra GTA$100,000. {STEAM_CLAN_IMAGE}/45517848/90472331383f1c77c22a7b53c1226a2042bb739e.jpg 2X GTA$ AND RP ON MOBILE OPERATIONS MISSIONS Lead strategic Mobile Operations Missions from your customized command center and execute precision strikes or intercept enemy convoys to earn 2X GTA$ and RP. For Bunker owners looking to expand their arsenal, the Mobile Operations Center, along with all its Upgrades and Modifications, is 30% off through April 30. See full event details at the Rockstar Newswire.

title: Smoke Lamar in the New Hunting Pack Remix
contents: Lamar Davis is in big trouble again. In this new take on Hunting Pack, the LD Organics van is on fire — clouding Lamar’s mind and vision — while a rival gang is in hot pursuit. Join Lamar and the Grove Street Families to shepherd the product to its final destination, or team up with the Ballas and Vagos to bring the delivery to a screeching halt. Play Hunting Pack (Get Lamar) through April 23 to earn 2X GTA$ and RP, doubling to 4X Rewards for GTA+ Members. Winning two rounds of Hunting Pack (Get Lamar) will also complete the Weekly Challenge and get you the Black High Brass Tee in addition to GTA$100,000. Get involved by heading over to the Featured Series in Chamberlain Hills, and celebrate 4/20 all week long in GTA Online with themed in-game apparel, bonuses on Weed Product Sell Missions, Street Dealer Sales, and more. {STEAM_CLAN_IMAGE}/45517848/fb4decc58605af5c0fffd78a41b19888ce63859f.jpg 4/20 FITS Dress in the latest high fashion — log in and play GTA Online this week to receive the Gold 420 Pendant, Green 420 Festival Outfit and Yeti Earth Day Hoodie. Round out your 4/20 collection by completing any Biker Business Sell Mission this week to receive the Güffy Drug Rug Hoodie. 3X GTA$ ON WEED FARM SELL MISSIONS No matter how hard they try, decriminalization and legalization could never kill the black market. Pick your poison and feed the streets potent contraband of your own creation by offloading stock in Weed Farm Sell Missions and you’ll reap 3X GTA$. See full event details at the Rockstar Newswire.

title: Double Rewards on GTA Online’s Classic Heists
contents: Los Santos is a hustler’s paradise with countless avenues to riches — but few schemes top the thrills of the OG Heists. Crack The Fleeca Job, bust a mad professor out in The Prison Break, secure intel in The Humane Labs Raid, move contraband in Series A Funding, and take on The Pacific Standard Job for 2X GTA$ and RP this week. Completing any two Heist Finales this week will fulfill the Weekly Challenge and get you an additional bonus of GTA$100,000. If you’re looking to kickstart your heisting career, you’ll need a High-End Apartment complete with the necessary planning room — get one at 30% off this week from the Dynasty 8 website. {STEAM_CLAN_IMAGE}/45517848/c8d952b569ae34a65faca38fd44cd377f3130417.jpg 2X GTA$ AND RP ON PIZZA DELIVERY If preparation and teamwork aren't really your thing, and satiating the city's hungry masses is more your calling, get 2X GTA$ and RP on Pizza Delivery. Visit any of the three Pizza This… locations in Los Santos to get started. See full event details at the Rockstar Newswire.

title: GTA+ Members Blaze Ahead with the Bollokan Envisage Sports Car
contents: Burn rubber and pull out in a cloud of smoke with the retro-futuristic Bollokan Envisage (Sports) — complete with a rare livery — free to claim this month for GTA+ Members. Plus, stay fresh in new LD Organics gear and get half off Biker Businesses along with 2X GTA$ and RP on Acid Lab Sell Missions. All this and more is available to GTA+ Members through April 30. {STEAM_CLAN_IMAGE}/45517848/ef7b09678266a9385892958741c271b7ecbbe494.jpg CLAIM THE BOLLOKAN ENVISAGE Blaze the San Andreas freeways in your very own Bollokan Envisage (Sports), decked out in dark green hues and the special Full Futurism livery. This two-door sports car is also eligible for Imani Tech upgrades, keeping you safe from would-be pursuers in your rear-view. GTA+ Members can claim their Bollokan Envisage for free at The Vinewood Car Club showroom. See full event details at the Rockstar Newswire.

title: Speed to the Finish With 3X GTA$ and RP on HSW Races
contents: Looking to join the street racing elite? Get access to prime performance upgrades by listening for a call from Hao on your iFruit. Once you prove yourself, head to the Los Santos Car Meet to take advantage of the unique customizations Hao’s Special Works has to offer. After Hao’s finished his tweaks, put your upgraded rides to the test in HSW Races — paying out 3X GTA$ and RP across all 20 tracks. Completing any 3 Races this week will get you a GTA$200,000 bonus, delivered within 72 hours. NIGHTCLUB MANAGEMENT BONUSES Whatever happens out on the street, be sure to keep the party going in the club. This week, completing Nightclub Management Missions will result in double the usual Popularity, ensuring that the dance floor stays crowded and the cash keeps flowing. Meanwhile, behind the scenes, Warehouse Goods Production Speed is doubled, offering a perfect entryway for budding entrepreneurs to generate more revenue and make moves in Career Progress challenges that unlock other bonuses. Join the club scene's elite by taking control of a Nightclub and outfitting it to your exact specifications — both Nightclub Properties and their Upgrades and Modifications are 30% off this week. See full event details at the Rockstar Newswire.

title: Reach New Heights with Double Rewards on Air Freight Cargo Sell Missions
contents: Sell off valuable cargo in Air Freight Cargo Sell Missions this week and you’ll be rewarded with 2X the usual GTA$ and RP — stacking to a sky-high 4X for GTA+ Members. {STEAM_CLAN_IMAGE}/6144970/2fda38f0ca8a2ed901385a8f2db720ef2cfd89c0.jpg HANGAR STAFF SOURCING BOOSTS Maximize your enterprise’s efficiency and productivity this week by recruiting Rooster McCraw’s services for sourcing Air Freight Cargo: he’s guaranteed to haul two crates in half the time. Plus, complete 5 Resupply Missions for any business to fulfil the Weekly Challenge and bag GTA$100,000. See full event details at the Rockstar Newswire.

title: Collect a Colossal 2X GTA$ and RP on The Titan Job in Oscar Guzman Flies Again
contents: Help Oscar humble the massive Eberhard Munitions while securing stolen arms in The Titan Job, the explosive finale of Oscar Guzman Flies Again, and earn 2X GTA$ and RP through March 26. This is where all your preparations pay off, so don’t skimp on the details. TIP: The Titan 250 D’s weapons are all on its left side, so stay to the right of any objectives you need to destroy and make life easier for your gunners. Attempt this with a full lobby to really take advantage of the Titan’s firepower, and collect the Homing Launcher at the beginning to aid in taking out Eberhard’s helicopter fleet. Head over to Maze Bank Foreclosures to acquire the McKenzie Field Hangar and start working with Oscar. {STEAM_CLAN_IMAGE}/6144970/adcc246033b93c26b43bc1f3f2db1f21b14eb830.jpg 2X GTA$ AND RP ON VESPUCCI JOB (REMIX) Jump behind the wheel in this high speed, remixed version of a classic mode where one driver races against time to collect checkpoints while everyone else hunts them down. Take your shot at victory with 2X GTA$ and RP on The Vespucci Job (Remix) through March 26. Jump into the action by heading over to the Featured Series in Legion Square. See full event details at the Rockstar Newswire.

title: Cash In With Double Rewards on New Arms Trafficking Missions
contents: Intercept deliveries from rival arms-runners and deliver them to clients in the new Arms Trafficking Missions included as part of Oscar Guzman Flies Again, paying out 2X GTA$ and RP through March 19. Keep the operation humming and complete five Arms Trafficking Missions to fulfill the Weekly Challenge and earn the Buckingham Tee plus GTA$100,000. Once you’ve purchased the McKenzie Field Hangar, you can access Arms Trafficking Missions through the laptop inside your McKenzie Field Office or by calling Oscar to request work. New to the arms trade? Here are some tips to help you reach a comfortable cruising altitude: - Cargobob Recover: Don’t let the Cargobob take too much fire or you’ll drop your cargo. - Plane Steal: Build up speed before you try to take off in the Duster 300-H and return it to Oscar after completing your deliveries for a cash bonus. - Ratel Run: You can only collect shipments when using the Ratel. - Rival Destroy: Some transports will be on the move, while others are stationary; plan your routes accordingly and be cautious of ambushes. You can use the Dune FAV provided by Oscar on this mission. {STEAM_CLAN_IMAGE}/6144970/dbccc8f9c20c279390e08c8788cbe7482b23825b.jpg 20% OFF THE MAMMOTH F-160 RAIJU PLANE Take to the skies vertically in the Mammoth F-160 Raiju (Plane), slice through cloud cover undetected, and dominate local airspace — with a rare 20% off through March 19. Head to the Warstock Cache & Carry in-game site to buy yours now. You can store your new Raiju in your Smuggler Hangar at Fort Zancudo or LSIA and request delivery straight to the runway of the McKenzie Field Hangar up in Grapeseed using the location’s Personal Aircraft menu inside. See full event details at the Rockstar Newswire.
